name: BREVARD COUNTY FLORIDA
sampleDescriptions: General issues as they pertain to County government.  Beach renourishment, mid reach and south reach beaches.  Health of the Indian River Lagoon.
General issues as they pertain to County government, bridges and roads.
NASA transition from shuttle to next flight vehicles and the impact on the workforce in Brevard County, Florida.  Support for the commercial space industry.
Issues pertaining to beach renourishment, transportation and aerospace. Disaster supplemental.
